name: Groovy Cycle - GMTK Game Jam 2020
description:
Living life on the edge is dangerous! Help the G.U.Y. maneuver the dangerous underbelly of the cyber city highway as he jams outs irresponsibly on his motor bike. Put in the correct patterns to help him maintain his balance on the bike and continue his radical jamming. Make sure to avoid oncoming traffic at the same time or lose control!

Instructions: Avoid the traffic cones and run along the tops of oncoming vehicles.

Controls: Utilize the arrow keys at the appropriate time to match up with their receptacles. Press the space bar to jump

This game was designed and produced through collaboration in part by Phatjesuz, MedaTehief and Sirhc208 for entry into Game Maker Tool Kit 2020. Theme: Out of Control.

We hope you enjoy it!!!
